item.title: AMap使用
item.description:
申请密匙

展示地图

关于新建地图的代码在高德官方文档中写得比较详尽，此处就不再赘述。

高德文档

进入页面看到地图，就可以算是完成使用amap的伟大的第一步了。

展示图层

<template>

 <div id="map-container" style="width: 100%; height: 80vh;"></div>
 <button @click="hideLayer">隐藏图层</button>
 <button @click="showLayer">展示图层</button>

 <button @click="addLayer">添加图层</button>
 <button @click="removeLayer">移除图层</button>

</template>

<script setup>
import AMapLoader from '@amap/amap-jsapi-loader';
import { onMounted, onUnmounted } from 'vue';

let map = null;
let traffic = null;

const showLayer = () => {
 if (map.hasLayer(traffic)) {
 console.warn("Traffic layer is already visible.");
 return;
 }

 traffic.show(); // 显示图层

}

const hideLayer = () => {
 if (!map.hasLayer(traffic)) {
 console.warn("Traffic layer is not visible.");
 return;
 }
 traffic.hide(); // 隐藏图层
}

const addLayer = () => {

 if (map.hasLayer(traffic)) {
 console.warn("Traffic layer is already added.");
 return;
 }

 map.add(traffic); // 通过add方法添加图层
}

const removeLayer = () => {

 if (!map.hasLayer(traffic)) {
 console.warn("Traffic layer is not added.");
 return;
 }
 map.remove(traffic); // 通过remove方法移除图层
}


onMounted(() => {
 AMapLoader.load({
 key: "", // 申请好的Web端开发者Key，首次调用 load 时必填
 version: "2.0", // 指定要加载的 JSAPI 的版本，缺省时默认为 1.4.15
 plugins: ["AMap.Scale"], //需要使用的的插件列表，如比例尺'AMap.Scale'，支持添加多个如：['...','...']
 })
 .then((AMap) => {
 const defaultLayer = new AMap.createDefaultLayer({
 zooms: [3, 20], //可见级别
 visible: true, //是否可见
 opacity: 1, //透明度
 zIndex: 0, //叠加层级
 });

 const roadNetLayer = new AMap.TileLayer.RoadNet({
 zIndex: 1
 });


 map = new AMap.Map("map-container", {
 // 设置地图容器id
 viewMode: "2D", // 是否为3D地图模式
 zoom: 11, // 初始化地图级别
 center: [116.397428, 39.90923], // 初始化地图中心点位置
 layers: [defaultLayer, roadNetLayer], //layer为创建的默认图层
 });

 traffic = new AMap.TileLayer.Traffic({
 autoRefresh: true, //是否自动刷新，默认为false
 interval: 180, //刷新间隔，默认180s
 });

 map.add(traffic); //通过add方法添加图层
 })
 .catch((e) => {
 console.log(e);
 });
});

onUnmounted(() => {
 map?.destroy();
});

</script>

<style></style>

添加地图控件

<template>

 <div id="map-container" style="width: 100%; height: 80vh;"></div>

 <div class='input-card'>
 <div class="input-item">
 <input type="checkbox" @click="toggleScale" />比例尺
 </div>

 <div class="input-item">
 <input type="checkbox" id="toolbar" @click="toggleToolBar" />工具条
 </div>

 <div class="input-item">
 <input type="checkbox" id="controlBar" @click="toggleControlBar" />工具条方向盘
 </div>

 <div class="input-item">
 <input type="checkbox" id="overview" @click="toggleOverViewShow" />显示鹰眼
 </div>
 </div>

</template>

<script setup>
import AMapLoader from '@amap/amap-jsapi-loader';
import { onMounted, onUnmounted } from 'vue';

let map = null;

let overView = null;
let toolbar = null;
let controlBar = null;
let scale = null;

const toggleOverViewShow = (event) => {
 var checked = event.target.checked;
 if (checked) {
 overView.show();
 } else {
 overView.hide();
 }
}

const toggleControlBar = (event) => {
 var checked = event.target.checked;
 if (checked) {
 controlBar.show();
 } else {
 controlBar.hide();
 }
}

const toggleScale = (event) => {
 var checked = event.target.checked;
 if (checked) {
 scale.show();
 } else {
 scale.hide();
 }
}

const toggleToolBar = (event) => {
 var checked = event.target.checked;
 if (checked) {
 toolbar.show();
 } else {
 toolbar.hide();
 }
}


onMounted(() => {
 AMapLoader.load({
 key: "", // 申请好的Web端开发者Key，首次调用 load 时必填
 version: "2.0", // 指定要加载的 JSAPI 的版本，缺省时默认为 1.4.15
 plugins: ['AMap.ToolBar', 'AMap.ControlBar', 'AMap.Scale', 'AMap.HawkEye'] //加载插件,
 })
 .then((AMap) => {

 map = new AMap.Map("map-container", {
 // 设置地图容器id
 viewMode: "2D", // 是否为3D地图模式
 zoom: 11, // 初始化地图级别
 center: [116.397428, 39.90923], // 初始化地图中心点位置

 });

 toolbar = new AMap.ToolBar();
 controlBar = new AMap.ControlBar();
 scale = new AMap.Scale();
 overView = new AMap.HawkEye();

 map.addControl(toolbar);
 map.addControl(controlBar);
 map.addControl(scale);
 map.addControl(overView);
 })
 .catch((e) => {
 console.log(e);
 });
});

onUnmounted(() => {
 map?.destroy();
});


</script>

<style>
html,
body {
 height: 100%;
}

#container {
 height: 100%;
}

.input-card {
 width: 150px;
 top: 10px;
 left: 10px;
 bottom: auto;
}
</style>

添加点标记

添加多边形
